statements: SELECT * FROM EndangeredSpecies;
SELECT species_name, scientific_name, habitat FROM EndangeredSpecies;
SELECT population_size, species_name, conservation_status FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE conservation_status='Critically Endangered';
SELECT * FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE habitat LIKE '%Forest%';
SELECT scientific_name, population_size FROM EndangeredSpecies ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE conservation_status = 'Critically Endangered';
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE population_size > 1000 ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT conservation_status, habitat FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE conservation_status IN ('Critically Endangered', 'Endangered') ORDER BY conservation_status ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT conservation_status FROM EndangeredSpecies;
SELECT scientific_name, population_size FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE habitat LIKE '%forest%';
SELECT * FROM EndangeredSpecies;
SELECT species_name, conservation_status FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE conservation_status = 'Critically Endangered';
SELECT species_id, species_name FROM EndangeredSpecies ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT species_name, COUNT(*) AS species_count FROM EndangeredSpecies GROUP BY species_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT species_name, mutation_rate FROM EndangeredSpecies INNER JOIN GeneticData ON EndangeredSpecies.species_id = GeneticData.species_id WHERE mutation_rate > 0.05 ORDER BY mutation_rate DESC;
SELECT species_name, conservation_status FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered';
SELECT * FROM GeneticData WHERE mutation_rate > 0.05;
SELECT species_name, mutation_rate FROM EndangeredSpecies JOIN GeneticData ON EndangeredSpecies.species_id = GeneticData.species_id;
SELECT * FROM GeneticData WHERE species_id IN (SELECT species_id FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE conservation_status = 'Critically Endangered');
SELECT species_name, COUNT(*) AS mutation_count FROM EndangeredSpecies JOIN GeneticData ON EndangeredSpecies.species_id = GeneticData.species_id GROUP BY species_name;
SELECT * FROM EndangeredSpecies;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE population_size > 100;
SELECT species_name, conservation_status FROM EndangeredSpecies ORDER BY conservation_status DESC;
SELECT * FROM GeneticData WHERE mutation_rate < 0.5;
SELECT action_id, action_description, action_date FROM ConservationActions WHERE action_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT species_name, conservation_status FROM EndangeredSpecies
SELECT * FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered'
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM EndangeredSpecies ORDER BY population_size DESC
SELECT action_description, action_date FROM ConservationActions WHERE action_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT EndangeredSpecies.species_name, GeneticData.mutation_rate FROM EndangeredSpecies INNER JOIN GeneticData ON EndangeredSpecies.species_id = GeneticData.species_id
SELECT * FROM endangered_species;
SELECT species_name, conservation_status FROM endangered_species WHERE conservation_status='Endangered';
SELECT id, gene_name, sequence FROM genetic_data ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM researcher WHERE affiliation='International Union for Conservation of Nature';
SELECT species_name, observation_date, location FROM endangered_species JOIN observations ON endangered_species.id = observations.species_id ORDER BY observation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM endangered_species ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT gene_name, mutation_rate FROM genetic_data WHERE mutation_rate > 0.05;
SELECT rs.researcher_name, rs.affiliation, o.observation_date FROM researcher rs JOIN observations o ON rs.id = o.researcher_id WHERE o.location = 'Forest';
SELECT es.species_name, es.conservation_status, gd.gene_name, gd.mutation_rate FROM endangered_species es JOIN genetic_data gd ON es.id = gd.species_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total_Count, es.habitat FROM endangered_species es GROUP BY habitat HAVING Total_Count > 3;
SELECT * FROM EndangeredSpecies;
SELECT species_name, conservation_status FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered';
SELECT DISTINCT habitat_description FROM EndangeredSpecies;
SELECT data_id, species_id, genetic_sequence FROM GeneticData ORDER BY data_id DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, research_area FROM Researcher WHERE affiliation IS NOT NULL ORDER BY researcher_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Observation;
SELECT species_name, habitat_description FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE conservation_status = 'CR';
SELECT observation_date, location FROM Observation WHERE location LIKE '%Forest%';
SELECT researcher_name, affiliation, research_area FROM Researcher ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT species_name, conservation_status FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE conservation_status = 'EN' ORDER BY species_name ASC;
